raw_comment: I noticed that the southern states received their leaves sooner than the northern states. I wonder why some states in the middle receive leaves later than others. A logical answer to this inquiry would be mountain ranges and precipitation.
ace_sentences: I noticed that the southern states received their leaves sooner than the northern states.
I wonder why some states in the middle receive leaves later than other states.
A logical answer to this inquiry is that mountain ranges affect the time when a state receives its leaves.
A logical answer to this inquiry is that precipitation affects the time when a state receives its leaves.
